anathema: Destroy a natural barrier, pursue a personal relationship after being refused, betray a lover
edict: Hinder travel, create and enforce physical and emotional boundaries, build defensive earthworks
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ashukharma (The Divine Divide)](/Deities.aspx?ID=611)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Hinder travel, create and enforce physical and emotional boundaries, build defensive earthworks

**Anathema** Destroy a natural barrier, pursue a personal relationship after being refused, betray a lover

**Area of Concern**
Canyons, cliffs, gorges, ravines

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=379)

**Domains** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shattering Gem](/Spells.aspx?ID=2364)

- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1667)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1751)

</column>
name: Ashukharma (The Divine Divide)
religious_symbol: A deep, jagged gorge in dry earth
